data.name: Nova
data.description: Last of the Nova Corps, Richard Rider uses the Nova Force to clear away enemy defenses and keeps his allies healed through the fight.

starItems.name: Nova
starItems.description: Last of the Nova Corps, Richard Rider uses the Nova Force to clear away enemy defenses and keeps his allies healed through the fight.

item.name: Nova's Basic Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, clear all Barrier on primary and adjacent targets.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear <color=#86e619>4</color> positive effects instead.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has applied <color=#3b8dcb>Nova Force</color> this match, Bonus Attack the primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, always revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects on primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects.
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary and adjacent targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary and adjacent targets

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>330%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from primary and adjacent targets
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from primary and adjacent targets.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies

7.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from primary and adjacent targets.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
7.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, clear all Barrier on primary and adjacent targets
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has applied <color=#3b8dcb>Nova Force</color> this match, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary and adjacent targets
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, characters killed by this attack cannot be revived

item.name: Nova's Special Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, clear all Barrier on primary and adjacent targets.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from primary and adjacent targets.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > On <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, if this character has applied <color=#3b8dcb>Nova Force</color> this match, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the primary and adjacent targets.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to the primary target for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.
 > On <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to clear all Battlefield Effects on allied side and apply the Battlefield Effect, <color=#3b8dcb>Nova Force</color>, to allied side.

<color=#3b8dcb>Nova Force</color>:
 > On this character's or ally's Turn, that character clears <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect, gains +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>10</color>, and heals for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health.
 > For this character and each ally, when that character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> health, heal that character for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of Max Health. This can only occur once per match for self and each ally.
 > This character and all allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> on that character.
 > This Battlefield Effect lasts until cleared or until the end of the match.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
Clear all negative effects from self

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>700%</color> damage.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

Clear all negative effects from self.
Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.

 > Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.

<color=#3b8dcb>Nova Force</color>:
 > On this character's or ally's Turn, that character clears <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect, gains +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>10</color>, and heals for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health.

1.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. This can only trigger once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

At the end of any turn, if this character is <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and below <color=#86e619>75%</color> Health, clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> on this character, heal self for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Focus and +<color=#86e619>4,000%</color> Resistance.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, this character and <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Block Amount.
1.nextUpgrade: On Turn, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and heal self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health

On Turn, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and heal self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
At the end of any turn, if this character is <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and below <color=#86e619>75%</color> Health, clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> on this character, heal self for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Focus and +<color=#86e619>4,000%</color> Resistance.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, this character and <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Block Amount.
2.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies

3.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. This can only trigger once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

On Turn, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and heal self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
At the end of any turn, if this character is <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and below <color=#86e619>75%</color> Health, clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> on this character, heal self for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.
For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Focus and +<color=#86e619>4,000%</color> Resistance.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, this character and <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Block Amount.
3.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, while this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>Stun</color> cannot be applied to self or any <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies

4.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. This can only trigger once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

On Turn, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and heal self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
At the end of any turn, if this character is <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and below <color=#86e619>75%</color> Health, clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> on this character, heal self for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Focus and +<color=#86e619>4,000%</color> Resistance.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, this character and <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Block Amount.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.
 > While this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>Stun</color> cannot be applied to self or any <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, while this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, any <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally or self with <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, cannot have <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> applied to them
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, fill Speed Bar for self by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>15%</color> for each <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally + apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> and <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On Spawn in <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. This can only trigger once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.
 > Fill Speed Bar for self by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>15%</color> for each <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> and <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.

On Turn, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and heal self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
At the end of any turn, if this character is <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and below <color=#86e619>75%</color> Health, clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> on this character, heal self for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Focus and +<color=#86e619>4,000%</color> Resistance.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, this character and <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Block Amount.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.
 > While this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, any <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally or self with <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, cannot have <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> applied to them.
 > While this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>Stun</color> cannot be applied to self or any <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.
5.nextUpgrade: On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#fff568>CHARGED</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies, <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>

item.name: Nova's Passive Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.
